update ACCOUNT
CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TRAN_NO = #{tranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCH_NO = #{exchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_ACCT = #{tradeAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT = #{acct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_NAME = #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCT_TYPE = #{acctType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_CODE = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTEND_INFO = #{extendInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SIGN_TIME = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIGN_OFF_TIME = #{signOffTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TRAN_SENDER = #{tranSender,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SIGN_STATUS = #{signStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARD_STATUS = #{cardStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update ACCOUNT set CLIENT_ID = #{clientId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TRAN_NO = #{tranNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCH_NO = #{exchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_ACCT = #{tradeAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT = #{acct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT_NAME = #{acctName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMT = #{amt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CURRENCY = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCT_TYPE = #{acctType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CERT_TYPE = #{certType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_CODE = #{certCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLIENT_NAME = #{clientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXTEND_INFO = #{extendInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_TIME = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SIGN_OFF_TIME = #{signOffTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TRAN_SENDER = #{tranSender,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SIGN_STATUS = #{signStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CARD_STATUS = #{cardStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
